EKSUAND JOS accept General English at NCE in lieu of 
credit in ‘O’ level English Language or TC II merit. 
IAUEDrequires 'A' level passes in Geography and any 
other Science subject, Economics or Government. 
MAUTY accepts NCE merit plus three (3) relevant 
credits ‘O’ level passes /TC II  
EDSU Same as in Education Biology.  
EDZAR requires three (3) NCE merit /'A' level passes. 
Candidates must obtain 'O' level credit pass in English 
Language and four (4) other subjects and 'O' level pass 
in Literature in English and Mathematics. Accepts NCE 
in English Language combined with any other subject 
with 'C' grade including Education. Admission is by 
Direct Entry only.  
ILORIN accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes/NCE merit which 
should include Geography/Physics and  
Economics  or  Government/Political  Science.  
Preference will be given to NCE holders for Direct 
Entry. General English at NCE is not acceptable as a 
replacement for ‘O’ Level credit pass in English 
Language.  
UMYUK  accepts  two  (2)  'A’  level  passes  in  
Geography/Physics and any other Science subject.  
NCE merit in Geography/Physics and any other Science 
subject is also acceptable.  
MAUTY accepts 'A' level passes or its equivalent in two 
(2) relevant subjects /NCE distinction, merit or credit. 
OAU a ccepts two (2) 'A' level passes in relevant 
subjects which must include Geography/Physics plus 
other subject chosen from Economics, Mathematics, 
Business Methods and Government or NCE Social 
Studies combined with any Social Science subject may 
be accepted. ABU accepts  
two  (2)  ‘A’  level  passes/NCE 
 merit inGeography/Physics and Education. 
IJMB/'A' level passes with C grade in 
Geography/Physics.
